column4: Active acquisition of information on a phenomenon
Generation of data through a computational process
Transformation of digital information into a corrected, ordered, and simplified form
Transformation and comparison of measurement values with respect to a calibration standard of known accuracy
Application of filters or criteria to select partial information
Process of inspecting, cleansing, transforming, and modeling data with the goal of discovering useful information, informing conclusions, and supporting decision-making
Estimation of physical properties using indirect in formation
